Articles.Content:
Hello All! After having played this game for 3-4 days, a ton of math, and learning the basics of everything, I can finally present to you my proudest (and really my first) accomplishment, the Exodus 7!

*Stage 4 rockets have enough power to get the vessel out of Kerbins atmosphere.

*Stage 3 rockets have enough power to get the vessel into a stable orbit around Kerbin.

*Stage 2 Rockets have enough power / fuel to set course for the Mun, and land on the Mun.

*(also might be enough fuel to get back to Kerbin, but probably not.)

*Stage 1 is just the capsule decoupler and parachute.

I hope you all enjoy!
